inclusion.criterion: accepting to be treated with 100 U/mL rapid-acting insulin analog
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: HbA1c ≥ 8% despite of the use of a pump for at least 6 months
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: glucose self-monitoring several times ( ≥ 4) a day
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: agree to use the system with activated loop mode during at least 75% of total time of use
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: affiliated to any kind of social security
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: receiving a total daily dose of insulin lower than 8 U
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: suffering from a serious illness or having a treatment that might significantly impair diabetes physiology
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: severe uncorrected problems of hearing and/or visual acuity preventing proper use of DBLG1 System
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: unable to understand and perform all of the instructions regarding the devices and the clinical investigation provided by Diabeloop
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: planning to perform during the year of study repeated magnetic resonance imaging (MRI), computed tomography (CT) scan, or high-frequency electrical heat treatment
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a 34-year-old woman from Jordan with general and non-specific bones and joints pain. Her past medical and drug history are unremarkable.
